</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>, [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 61

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This greasy stick emits a stomach-churning scent when held in hand.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_acid grip_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1436) of the indicated rank. A creature that takes initial acid damage from this spell become [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91) 1. Use your spell DC if the creature attempts to recover from this sickness. This is an [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=664) effect.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _acid grip_ of the appropriate rank.
